lines.text: Oh, wait! I'm afraid of that gorilla!
He won't hurt you - not after she's told him not to.
And suppose she tells him different... what then?
Mr. Stockwell, open up, it's the police. Open up the door or we'll break it in!
[the policeman batter down the door and search the apartment]
Well, he's gone. Some little girl's going to have a broken heart when she discovers her doll was left behind.
I don't like the way he looks at me.
Oh, Samson won't hurt you... unless I tell him to.
